argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | srgidm.b | |- B = ( Base ` R ) |
| 2 |  | srgidm.t | |- .x. = ( .r ` R ) |
| 3 |  | srgidm.u | |- .1. = ( 1r ` R ) |
| 4 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_srgidmlem | |- ( ( R e. SRing /\ X e. B ) -> ( ( .1. .x. X ) = X /\ ( X .x. .1. ) = X ) ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_simprd | |- ( ( R e. SRing /\ X e. B ) -> ( X .x. .1. ) = X ) |
